Key Match Events: Denzel Dumfries headed an equalizer for the Netherlands in the 86th minute after Hungary took a 1-0 lead in the 32nd minute with a goal by Roland Sallai.
Virgil van Dijk was sent off with two yellow cards, reducing the Netherlands to 10 men late in the match.
Post-Match Reflections: Denzel Dumfries praised the team's resilience and said the draw was fair despite Hungary's defensive structure.
Hungary ended a 9-match losing streak against the Netherlands.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Netherlands had over 80% possession in the first half but struggled to convert chances.
Hungary's goalkeeper Denes Dibusz made a good save from Cody Gakpo.
